players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
You: "Alice is innocent. Charlie’s accusation is baseless and meant to mislead us. Let’s focus on finding the real threat instead of rushing to judgment."
You: "Alice wouldn't waste time denying without evidence. Charlie's quick to accuse—maybe he's trying to cover something. Diana, what do you think?"
Diana: "I believe Charlie's accusation is premature and lacks evidence. Let us focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."
Charlie: "Alice is the only confirmed mafia here. Delaying her arrest puts town members at risk. We must vote her out now before she can harm more of us."

players.name: Charlie

Alice: "Alice is innocent. Charlie’s accusation is baseless and meant to mislead us. Let’s focus on finding the real threat instead of rushing to judgment."
Alice: "Alice wouldn't waste time denying without evidence. Charlie's quick to accuse—maybe he's trying to cover something. Diana, what do you think?"
Diana: "I believe Charlie's accusation is premature and lacks evidence. Let us focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."
You: "Alice is the only confirmed mafia here. Delaying her arrest puts town members at risk. We must vote her out now before she can harm more of us."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
